name: Jalaram Industries
overview:
Established in the year 1985, we, “Jalaram Industries”, are an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a wide assortment of Stainless Steel Fastener, Monel Fastener, Hastelloy Fastener, Titanium Fastener, Duplex Steel Fastener and Alloy Steel Fastener.

Our Team: Manufacturing agents Quality controllers R & D experts Sales and marketing personnel Warehousing and packaging personnel

Our Quality: We have always been a quality driven organization, striving its level best to manufacture and deliver a flawless range of High Tensile Fastener, Automotive Nut, Automobile Bolt and Industrial Camshaft to our clients. For this purpose, all our products are manufactured using premium quality raw material, obtained from authorized vendors of the industry, in strict compliance with international quality standards.

Our Infrastructure: We have with us, a well-maintained and capacious infrastructure, sprawling over a vast area of land, fully furnished with all the latest amenities which are required in manufacturing and delivering a qualitative range of products to our clients. In addition to this, this unit has been divided efficiently into various departments, in order to carry out the production process in a smooth and sophisticated manner.

Client Satisfaction: Being a patron-centric organization, we aim to deliver a high-grade quality range of High Tensile Fastener, Automotive Nut, Automobile Bolt and Industrial Camshaft. Precisely designed under the able guidance and expertise of our professionals, who make use of the latest technology and advanced amenities which are required in offering a qualitative range of products to our esteemed clients.

Why Us?: Rich industry experience Advanced production units Team of professionals Transparent business dealings Competitive prices Timely execution
